snippet: Haruhiko Kuroda, a Finance Ministry veteran and lover of Greek philosophy, has been charged with turning around an institution reviled for its monetary policy.
abstract: Haruhiko Kuroda is approved to become the next Bank of Japan governor; he will be charged with turning around an institution that is reviled for its monetary policy and blamed for decades of national economic woe; Kuroda's appointment follows long-time criticism of bank.
lead_paragraph: Haruhiko Kuroda, a Finance Ministry veteran and lover of Greek philosophy, has been charged with turning around an institution reviled for its monetary policy.

headline.seo: Kuroda, a Critic of Japan’s Central Bank, Takes On Task of Redirecting It
headline.main: Critic of Japan’s Central Bank Is Now Its Leader
headline.print_headline: In Japan, Critic Rises To Redirect State Bank
